sources.title: Finding A Family
sources.description: Bright Alex grows up in Michigan proud of his mother, Romanian immigrant Ileana, who became a professor, vowing to make her dream come true by graduating from Harvard. But when mother becomes manic-depressive and repeatedly dumps her medication, Alex each time lands in foster care. At age 16, he gets legal emancipation and vows to take charge of their lives himself.

metadata.Plot: Bright Alex grows up in Michigan proud of his mother, Romanian immigrant Ileana, who became a professor, vowing to make her dream come true by graduating from Harvard. At age 16, he gets legal emancipation and vows to take charge of their lives himself.
metadata.Actors: Kim Delaney, Jared Abrahamson, Sarah-Jane Redmond
